City Council
============

Meetings
--------

6:30 p.m. Â | Â 2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month  
Bulverde City Hall (30360 Cougar Bend, Bulverde, TX 78163)  
View the [City Calendar](https://bulverdetx.gov/calendar.aspx) for the most up-to-date meeting schedule.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings.

[City Council Meeting Information](http://tx-bulverde.civicplus.com/257/City-Meeting-Information)

Members
-------

* [Helen Hays](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Mayor-Helen-Hays-51), Mayor | Term Expires May 2028
* [Jason Krawietz](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Jason-Krawietz-48), Council Member Place 1 | Term Expires May 2028
* [Francesca Watson](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Francesca-Watson-46), Council Member Place 2 | Term Expires May 2028
* [Ted Hawkins](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Ted-Hawkins-47), Council Member Place 3 | Term Expires May 2026
* [Clint Hays](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Clint-Hays-49), Council Member Place 4 | Term Expires May 2026
* [Joe Alexandre](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Joe-Alexandre-50), Council Member Place 5 | Term Expires May 2027
* [Christopher Goth](https://bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-Councilmember-Christopher-Goth-53), Council Member Place 6 | Term Expires May 2027

To contact a member of the City Council, please click on their respective name above. To contact **ALL** members of the City Council, [please click here](https://www.bulverdetx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Us-6/Contact-City-Council-All-Members-77).

About the Council
-----------------

The City Council of Bulverde is comprised of a Mayor and 6 Council members elected at-large.  
  
Council may meet earlier than the regular scheduled meetings if there is an Executive Session scheduled. The Council may hold a Special Meeting so long as it complies with the Texas Open Meetings Act.

1. [City Council](https://www.bulverdetx.gov/186/City-Council)
2. [Planning & Zoning Commission](https://tx-bulverde.civicplus.com/185/Planning-Zoning-Commission)
3. [Parks & Recreation Advisory Board](https://tx-bulverde.civicplus.com/166/Parks-Recreation)
4. [Zoning Board of Adjustments](https://tx-bulverde.civicplus.com/260/Zoning-Board-of-Adjustment)
5. [Charter Review Commission](https://bulverdetx.gov/162/Charter-Review-Commission)
